description:
Get in a pre-work paddle or tour on a lake on your weekend. This inflatable board is built to withstand a bit of knocking around so you can head through the trees to that secret spot and get there intact. To or from, it folds right up for easy packing in your car.

  • Inflates to 20psi for flex-free performance
  • Double sidewalls with PVC drop-stitch construction stand up to abrasion and abuse
  • Axis acrylic stiffener integrated into the deck improves performance without adding weight or making the board hard to roll up
  • Grippy foam deck keeps you on board through rough waters and radical manoeuvres
  • 12 D-rings let you attach lots of gear
  • 3 webbing handles allow easy carrying
  • Nylon fins flex to absorb impact. The set of one 5in. and one 9in. lets you select the length right for you and the conditions
  • Includes repair kit, a high-pressure pump with pressure gauge, Leafield valve adapter and a carrying bag with integrated backpack straps
name: NRS Escape 12.6 Inflatable SUP Board
